attributes.action: Make companies recognise Forces personnel do not choose to move!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are forces personnel restricted to the same contract terms that Civilians are, and are subsequently charged for prematurely ending the contract, when it is not through their own choice that they are moving on her Majesty's orders!

Why are companies such as BT, Virgin Media and O2 able to charge us early cancellation fees when where we are posted to is out of our hands? WE NEED IT STOPPING!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
